acolyte.name: Acolyte
acolyte.description: You have spent your life in service to a temple, learning sacred rites and providing sacrifices to your deity.

feature.name: Shelter of the Faithful
feature.description: You and your companions can receive free healing and care at temples of your faith. Those who share your religion will support you at a modest lifestyle.

charlatan.name: Charlatan
charlatan.description: You have always had a way with people. You know what makes them tick, you can tease out their hearts' desires after a few minutes of conversation.
equipment: Tools of the con (weighted dice, marked cards, etc.)

feature.name: False Identity
feature.description: You have created a second identity including documentation, established acquaintances, and disguises. You can forge documents including official papers and personal letters.

city_watch.name: City Watch
city_watch.description: You have served the community where you grew up, standing as its first line of defense against crime and violence.

feature.name: Watcher's Eye
feature.description: You can easily pick out patterns and behaviors that are out of the ordinary. You can quickly identify the location of a hideout or identify the routine of a suspect.

clan_crafter.name: Clan Crafter
clan_crafter.description: You are a respected member of a dwarven clan, trained in the ancient traditions of your people's crafts.

feature.name: Respect of the Stout Folk
feature.description: No one esteems clan crafters quite so highly as dwarves do. You always have free room and board in any dwarven settlement, and individuals in such settlements might provide you with weapons or armor at cost.

criminal.name: Criminal
criminal.description: You are an experienced criminal with a history of breaking the law.

feature.name: Criminal Contact
feature.description: You have a reliable contact who acts as your liaison to a network of other criminals. You can get messages to and from your contact over great distances.

entertainer.name: Entertainer
entertainer.description: You thrive in front of an audience. You know how to entrance them, entertain them, and even inspire them.

feature.name: By Popular Demand
feature.description: You can always find a place to perform. You receive free lodging and food of a modest or comfortable standard as long as you perform each night.

far_traveler.name: Far Traveler
far_traveler.description: You come from a distant place, one so remote that few people know it exists. When you came to this land, you faced many challenges.
toolProficiencies: One musical instrument or gaming set
equipment: Small piece of jewelry worth 10 gp

feature.name: All Eyes on You
feature.description: Your accent, mannerisms, figures of speech, and appearance mark you as foreign. Curious people are eager to hear stories of your homeland and will treat you well, though some may react with suspicion or fear.

folk_hero.name: Folk Hero
folk_hero.description: You come from a humble social rank, but you are destined for so much more. The common folk see you as their champion.

feature.name: Rustic Hospitality
feature.description: Since you come from the ranks of the common folk, you fit in among them with ease. You can find a place to hide, rest, or recuperate among commoners.

guild_artisan.name: Guild Artisan
guild_artisan.description: You are a member of an artisan's guild, skilled in a particular field and closely associated with other artisans.

feature.name: Guild Membership
feature.description: You can rely on the guild for lodging and food if necessary, and to pay for your funeral. The guild will also help you find work and provide access to powerful political figures through the guild.

haunted_one.name: Haunted One
haunted_one.description: You are haunted by something so terrible that you dare not speak of it. Whatever it was, it has left you scarred and forever changed.

feature.name: Heart of Darkness
feature.description: Those who look into your eyes can see that you have faced unimaginable horror. Commoners will extend you every courtesy and do their utmost to help you. They sense your haunted nature.

hermit.name: Hermit
hermit.description: You lived in seclusion for a formative part of your life. In your time apart from society, you found quiet, solitude, and perhaps some of the answers you were looking for.

feature.name: Discovery
feature.description: The quiet seclusion of your extended hermitage gave you access to a unique and powerful discovery. The exact nature of this revelation depends on the nature of your seclusion.

investigator.name: Investigator
investigator.description: You relentlessly seek the truth. Perhaps you're a detective, a reporter, or a scholarly researcher of mysteries and urban legends.

feature.name: Official Inquiry
feature.description: You have the authority to conduct official investigations. Local authorities and officials will cooperate with you and provide access to records and crime scenes.

knight_of_the_order.name: Knight of the Order
knight_of_the_order.description: You belong to an order of knights who are sworn to a particular cause or philosophy. Whether you serve a deity, protect the innocent, or pursue knowledge, your order defines your purpose.
toolProficiencies: One type of gaming set or musical instrument
equipment: Signet or insignia of your order
Banner or other symbol of your order

feature.name: Knightly Regard
feature.description: You receive shelter and succor from members of your order and those who are sympathetic to its aims. If your order is a religious one, you can gain aid from temples and other organizations related to your deity.

mercenary_veteran.name: Mercenary Veteran
mercenary_veteran.description: You have been a soldier for hire, fighting for coin and glory. War has been your life, but you fought for pay rather than loyalty to a nation.

feature.name: Mercenary Life
feature.description: You know the mercenary life as well as you know your own weapons. You can identify mercenary companies by their emblems and know the going rates for hiring soldiers.

noble.name: Noble
noble.description: You understand wealth, power, and privilege. You carry a noble title, and your family owns land, collects taxes, and wields significant political influence.

feature.name: Position of Privilege
feature.description: You are welcome in high society, and people assume you have the right to be wherever you are. The common folk make every effort to accommodate you and avoid your displeasure.

outlander.name: Outlander
outlander.description: You grew up in the wilds, far from civilization and the comforts of town and technology. You've witnessed the migration of herds, survived weather extremes, and enjoyed the solitude of being the only thinking creature for miles.
equipment: Trophy from an animal you killed

feature.name: Wanderer
feature.description: You have an excellent memory for maps and geography. You can always recall the general layout of terrain, settlements, and features around you. You can find food and fresh water for yourself and up to five others each day.

sage.name: Sage
sage.description: You spent years learning the lore of the multiverse. You scoured manuscripts, studied scrolls, and listened to the greatest experts.
equipment: Letter from dead colleague with unanswered question

feature.name: Researcher
feature.description: When you attempt to learn or recall a piece of lore, if you don't know it, you often know where and from whom you can obtain it.

sailor.name: Sailor
sailor.description: You sailed on a seagoing vessel for years. In that time, you faced storms, monsters, and enemy ships. You know ship protocols and how to work as part of a crew.

feature.name: Ship's Passage
feature.description: When you need to, you can secure free passage on a sailing ship for yourself and your companions. You might sail on the ship you served on, or another ship you have good relations with.

soldier.name: Soldier
soldier.description: War has been your life for as long as you care to remember. You trained as a youth, studied the use of weapons and armor, and learned basic survival techniques.
equipment: Set of bone dice or deck of cards

feature.name: Military Rank
feature.description: You have a military rank from your career as a soldier. Soldiers loyal to your former military organization still recognize your authority and influence.

urban_bounty_hunter.name: Urban Bounty Hunter
urban_bounty_hunter.description: You have made a living tracking down criminals, fugitives, or monsters in cities and settlements.
toolProficiencies: Two from: gaming set, musical instrument, or thieves' tools

feature.name: Ear to the Ground
feature.description: You are in frequent contact with people in the underworld. You can find informants who can provide information about criminals, fugitives, or the location of hidden lairs.

urchin.name: Urchin
urchin.description: You grew up on the streets alone, orphaned, and poor. You had no one to watch over you or provide for you, so you learned to provide for yourself.

feature.name: City Secrets
feature.description: You know the secret patterns and flow of cities and can find passages through the urban sprawl that others would miss. When you are not in combat, you and companions can travel between any two locations in the city twice as fast as normal.
